## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code follows project coding standards
- [ ] TypeScript strict mode compliance
- [ ] Functions are small and focused
- [ ] JSDoc comments added for non-trivial functions
- [ ] No console.log or debug code

### Verification
- [ ] `pnpm typecheck` passes
- [ ] `pnpm lint` passes
- [ ] `pnpm test` passes
- [ ] `pnpm build` succeeds

### Security & Privacy
- [ ] No secrets in code/logs
- [ ] Input validation added
- [ ] RLS policies verified (if database changes)
- [ ] Service role key usage is server-side only (if applicable)
- [ ] Audit logging added for critical actions

### Database (if applicable)
- [ ] Migration file created
- [ ] Migration tested locally
- [ ] RLS policies included
- [ ] Types regenerated

### Documentation
- [ ] README updated (if needed)
- [ ] Code comments added
- [ ] API documentation updated (if applicable)

### AI Features (if applicable)
- [ ] Prompt versions updated
- [ ] Prompt versions logged in audit trails
- [ ] AI calls are server-side only

### Review Readiness
- [ ] PR description is complete
- [ ] Commits follow conventional commit format
- [ ] Branch is up to date
- [ ] CI checks are passing
